
An intern reused a prime generating RSA keys for two users. Both exchanged secrets. Recover the flag from 374251295375116801177696085860911971141002665440898316063491111215166524643991334941715286829742212824865203720367633740227691573134455226067001447684124819529194856100149595503008989483798465642250448037574914324331774259020464621 by exploiting the repeated prime vulnerability!


The flag format is flag{...}
n=410553520394899787679515831996896386483855577603324380823627958592345436133530346422449444993354725222065955126226123877076339898072922711742952325525978363624062201378862004887371543864592404742098523425351503923898162314299071641, e=396200988202757040335375116634013741015542415429749974185246845370844626700330374994777536167892363460755317992554279983426837684823373743951926917357124316216160070722059148286932692183174445606316454589652430786861098755774696009

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{1z3rieew}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 374251295375116801177696085860911971141002665440898316063491111215166524643991334941715286829742212824865203720367633740227691573134455226067001447684124819529194856100149595503008989483798465642250448037574914324331774259020464621
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=410553520394899787679515831996896386483855577603324380823627958592345436133530346422449444993354725222065955126226123877076339898072922711742952325525978363624062201378862004887371543864592404742098523425351503923898162314299071641, e=396200988202757040335375116634013741015542415429749974185246845370844626700330374994777536167892363460755317992554279983426837684823373743951926917357124316216160070722059148286932692183174445606316454589652430786861098755774696009
extra_info: p=20262120333146276813410296586919270759234824683542581376789093765482412320222439417707840647457243255283949827383621, q=20262120333146276813410296586919270759234824683542581376789093765482412320222439417707840647457243255283949827383621, Ï†(n)=410553520394899787679515831996896386483855577603324380823627958592345436133530346422449444993354725222065955126226083352835673605519295891149778486984459893974695116216108426699840579039951959863263107744056589437387594414644304400
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
